pages.text: Apathy withers the soul, making it unable to attain $(l:bewitchment:introduction/altars)Magical Energy$(). Villagers and $(l:bewitchment:creatures/demon)Demons$() will reject trading, and animals will flee from the victim of this powerful $(l:bewitchment:curses/conducting_curses)Curse$().
This is a $(l:bewitchment:curses/conducting_curses)Greater Curse$(); it is slightly harder to get rid of.
